name: ACTOR
title: ACTOR
description: Ancestor of all real-world types, including people and organisations. An actor is any real-world entity capable of taking on a role.

element.short: Ancestor of all real-world types, including people and organisations.
element.definition: Ancestor of all real-world types, including people and organisations. An actor is any real-world entity capable of taking on a role.

element.short: Languages which can be used to communicate with this actor, in preferred order of use (if known, else order irrelevant).

element.short: Identifiers of the Version container for each Role played by this Party.
